title: Utilities & Site Services

Provide SLAs for each service to factories and community facilities.

title: Rural Industries Research Center — مركز أبحاث الصناعات الريفية
text: Coordinate applied research, standards, and product/market intelligence to feed RSIC iterations.

title: What We Make — الاستراتيجية الصناعية
text:
Industry is the gate to a balanced national economy powered by science and technology.
Balance self-sufficiency industries with export-oriented innovation.
Use a dynamic industrial map responsive to resources, markets, and sustainability.
Conserve renewables; ensure generational fairness.


الخارطة الصناعية الديناميكية المتوازنة محلياً وإقليمياً وعالمياً هي بوصلة المنتجين الصناعيين.

title: How We Make — فلسفة صناعية
text:
Human-centered & ethical manufacturing at the speed and quality of modern industry:

Balanced industrial power across public, private, cooperatives, community companies, endowments, and listed firms.
Family/community-scale production with modern quality systems.
Producer-first education: Student-Centered Learning and hands-on training.


الإنسان محور الصناعة. نبحث عن توليفة متوازنة للأجسام المالكة للقوة الصناعية حسب وعي المجتمع المحلي.

title: Why Industry? — لماذا الصناعة؟
text:
Nations split into makers and extractees; industry is the path from poverty to dignity.
Industry underpins economic security and sustainable peace via regional & global partnerships.
“لا حرية بلا صناعة.. ولا صناعة بلا علم وعمل” — No freedom without industry; no industry without knowledge and work.


ملخص: الصناعة هي الانتقال الحقيقي للوفرة الاقتصادية ومحاربة الفقر؛ بوابة السلام المستدام؛ يتطلب ذلك رؤية صناعية وطنية، واستراتيجية واضحة، وبرامج تحول.

title: Next Steps — الخطوات القادمة
text:
Convene key stakeholders to agree red lines and approve the project.
Engage decision-makers to ensure protection & continuity across phases.
Fund preliminary studies and concept designs.
Appoint implementation team and begin hiring & training.

text:

تطوير وتوسع

400: Long-horizon, national industrial learning agenda
40: Priority industrial projects/clusters
4: Initial anchor RSIC sites

title: Rural Social Industrial Complex (RSIC) Wiki
text:
<strong>RSIC</strong> is a replicable model for community-driven rural industrialization in Sudan.
This wiki organizes the vision, roadmap, facilities, factories, shared resources, and replication steps.



Start with the Introduction and Replication Model.
Track progress in the Roadmap.
Explore proposed Factories and Shared Resources.

title: Introduction
text:
This wiki distills the attached presentation into a structured, replicable model for Rural Social Industrial Complexes (RSIC) in Sudan.


Executive Summary — المختصر المفيد

Industry is the lever for broad-based prosperity, sovereignty over resources, and durable peace.
Vision → Industrial Strategy → Transformation Programs, executed by a neutral, national, expert body.
The RSIC model centers people, ethics, and distributed ownership while pursuing speed and quality.


Source: RSIC presentation, July 2024. (انظر الشرائح ذات العناوين: المختصر المفيد، لماذا الصناعة؟)

title: When & Where — التكتيك الصناعي
text:
Choose tactics by product and market time–place (الزمكان):

Centralized manufacturing
Export-oriented hubs
Distributed/localized plants
Assembly models
Participatory/partner models


سلة غذاء العالم تتطلب زمكاناً دقيقاً يتماشى مع التحولات الكبرى حتى 2030م.

title: Shared Resources — المرافق المشتركة
text:
Industrial Transformation Technical Center (ITTC) — المركز التقني للتحول الصناعي
Research & Rural Industries Center — مركز أبحاث الصناعات الريفية
QA/QC Lab, Power, Water/Treatment, Logistics, Training spaces

title: Industrial Transformation Technical Center (ITTC) — المركز التقني للتحول الصناعي
text:
Purpose: Advanced Manufacturing training to uplift rural producers; progressive, student-centered learning with real-factory simulations.

Core Courses (Mandatory)

National ethos & work ethics; leadership & role models; social psychology; industrial management; industrial security; basic sciences; materials science; technology & AI; tolerances; industrial safety; TQM.



Departments (Core)

Design & process analysis; institutional innovation; reverse engineering & simulation; materials & colors; testing & quality; digital printing; CNC & cutting; welding & assembly; glass & plastics; electronics & control; coating & packaging; refractories & alloys; robotics & AI.



Curricula (Core)

Construction; agriculture; fishing & livestock; mining; manufacturing; transport & storage; trade.


الفلسفة التعليمية: تعلم وليس تعليم، التعلم المتمحور حول التلميذ، المنهج التطويري، محاكاة الصناعة والعمل الحقيقي، جرّاجات التعلم المجتمعية.

title: Replication Model — نموذج التكرار
text:
Practical Steps for Rural Revival — الخطوات العملية لنهضة الريف

Open community-run retail points to validate real demand.
Create a producer compass: plan, connect, simplify logistics (CIF mindset).
Establish community micro-facilities for food industries (homes, plots, neighborhoods).
Launch the Student Association hub with an incubator/accelerator.
Form youth & children cooperatives.
Establish the Industrial Transformation Technical Center.
Establish the Rural Industries Research Center.
Build Rural Social Industrial Complexes 1, 2, 3.
Found endowments: education → health → benevolent lending.


Use checklists below to operationalize each step.

title: Facilities Overview
text:
This section captures the site, utilities, and common infrastructure.

Proposed pilot area: Artiqasha East (Al-Burgaig), Dongola — Northern State (per presentation).
Distances and connectivity (as per slides): city ↔︎ technical center ~600m; center ↔︎ complex ~3.7km; complex ↔︎ paved road ~3.5km.

title: Location & Context — الموقع والسياق
text:
Near Barqiq and Dufufa agricultural projects; close to tourism and heritage assets.
Strategic adjacency to agricultural production and transport corridors.


Replace this section with maps, coordinates, utility connections, and land status.
